      • isValidHttpUrl

        public static boolean isValidHttpUrl​(java.lang.String url)
        Checks if given string has a valid url address. Valid schemes : "http", "https"
        Parameters:
        url - - The value validation is being performed on. A null value is considered invalid.
        Returns:
        true if valid
        Since:
        jcms-9.0.4 jcms-10
